name: Order Order
description:
Part RTS, part puzzle game, Control units and find ways to defeat all the enemies in a level.

For maximum damage sort a group of units by size to start combo hits.

Mouse is recommended

Made during The Wizard Jam 5

Music created by Jordan Hartley (https://jordanhartley.bandcamp.com)

Update 1.1 (22nd of June 2017)

  • Added a fast forward button to speed up time (F key)
  • Mouse hover an enemy to see the number of ordered units that is necessary to kill them
